Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking between the Holy Orders of the White Cross and Black Cross.
Room.LongDescription: This is not necessarily a good place to be. The great holy warriors of Oceancrest built these two facilities to further train and challenge themselves. It was eventually discovered that there must be evil in everything that is also good, but in order to truly be good, you must in fact face evil and be able to walk away from it.
